name: Rocks Hotel Casino

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a week here, and enjoyed the convenient location, within walking distance of the harbour, castle and shops.
reviews.title: Convenient and comfortable but mind the smoke

reviews.text: The design of the public areas is stunning - one of the nicest we have stayed in around the world. The staff were very friendly and tried to be helpful, but this was sometimes precluded by their lack of English, both at reception, but especially in the buffet. There was also a lack of appreciation of customer needs there, so if you went in for the dinner buffet, no-one thought to ask you if you would like to see the wine list when they were serving you water, and it was difficult to get their attention - no eye contact. Also in the morning, they seemed unable much of the time, to understand "tea with milk, please" as the latter rarely came without another prompt. Small things but simple to cure and annoying for guests.
reviews.title: Recent stay at The Rocks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had checked in late Sunday evening and dashed down for the excellent buffet before unpacking. When we got back to the room, however, we could hardly breathe because of the fumes of cigars/Turkish cigarettes. We assumed this had come in through the air conditioning from another bedroom. Give the hotel their due, within minutes an electric air filtering machine had been brought up, and an fresh air spray, and this with the opening of the windows helped clear the air a bit. And in the morning we were moved to another room without delay. However, we dare not switch on the air conditioning for the rest of our stay - OK in November, but what about when it is 100 degrees in summer?
reviews.title: Best 5 star hotel in Kyrenia

reviews.text: This quick response was also shown when my wife dropped a glass in the bathroom. Within minutes a maid was up with a hoover to ensure all the glass was cleared - excellent work!
reviews.title: Excellent service, unique dinners

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you brave the casino, you will find the smoke problem even worse : we are by no means "anti" and both smoked ourselves for years, but the atmosphere in the casino with virtually all the people in there smoking heavily, and there are lots of them from Turkey on package tours, prompted my wife to call it a day after only 15 minutes, and even I felt it too much. A stronger air conditionaing and filtering system must be called for.
reviews.title: Average but also very good

description: Rocks Hotel and Casino is an elegant and beautiful 5 Star Hotel right in the heart of Coastal Kyrenia. With its elegantly appointed rooms, warm and attentive staff,Exclusive Casino, spacious grounds and delicious International cusine, this will be a stay to remember
